# Ants
[color=red]Ants die in a single hit. Don't be surprised if you take an ant ghost role and die quickly.[/color]
Ants are a rare and reclusive species, and also the most diminuitive. They make up for their small size with their [color=#1e90ff]surprising strength[/color], allowing them to carry any item a larger species could. Unfortunately, ants are [color=#ffa500]extremely fragile[/color], rarely surviving after even the most minor injuries.
## Ant Naming Conventions
Ants names are rarely unique to themselves, and instead are generally an adjective followed by Ant. - [color=#449944]Acceptable:[/color] Shy Ant - [color=#449944]Acceptable:[/color] Scary Ant - [color=#449944]Acceptable:[/color] Happy Ant - [color=#994444]Bad:[/color] Benrant
